__e: You think we're looking for a cop?
- Because that means... that we're dealing with an ordinary flesh-and-blood killer.
It is impossible. He is not a murderer.
I don't know that I can do that, but I can tell you who the murderer is.
And the only way that he could have known that, at the time that he knew it, was if he, himself, was the killer.
Are you trying to work out who killed that man? Oui.
- But who is this murderer you keep talking about?
You know, I've been wondering. You think whoever killed Dad is still alive?
He's a murderer and a liar.

And forget about the fact that the rest of your people are supposedly 30 years ago. Now the only ones who are here to help us are a murderer and a guy who can't seem to remember how the hell he got out of a coffin.
My father was a murderer and a liar.
- We don't know anything about the murderer, and that's the problem.
He's a killer, and he saw you coming before, so I --
We got our killers, and it ain't him or his brother.
We're here to get our man.
I'll do everything in my power to find the scum that killed them.
I can tell that you'd do almost anything to find this killer of yours, but what are you willing to do to find yourselves?
Just trying to help you catch a killer.
You do want to help us catch his killer, don't you?
It's hard to catch a killer when you don't know who the victim is.
How could you live all these years knowing you were murderers?
Apparently, he, too, was willing to accept death, rather than becoming the killer the Mark wanted him to be.
I can tell that you'd do almost anything to find this killer of yours, but what are you willing to do to find yourselves?
The shooter, did he see you?
I'm thinking our killer isn't done.
I would say that there is a good chance the killer is one and the same.
I'm a murderer who can no longer live with myself.
